snippet: The United Nations said it moved members of its Golan peacekeeping force to the Israeli-controlled side because the area had “deteriorated severely.”
abstract: United Nations says it has withdrawn many peacekeepers from Israeli-controlled side of peacekeepers' buffer zone in Golan Heights after unidentified groups from Syria moved menacingly close to their positions on Syrian side.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations said it moved members of its Golan peacekeeping force to the Israeli-controlled side because the area had “deteriorated severely.”

headline.main: U.N. Moves Peacekeepers in Golan Over Safety Fears
headline.print_headline: U.N. Moves Golan Peacekeepers Over Safety Fears
